thread.title: Former FG candidate lands €260,000 job at EU court
thread.title_full: Former FG candidate lands €260,000 job at EU court

title: Former FG candidate lands €260,000 job at EU court
text: Former FG candidate lands €260,000 job at EU court Independent.ie Taoiseach Enda Kenny has nominated a former Fine Gael general election candidate for a €260,000-a-year taxpayer funded job in the European Union justice system, the Sunday Independent can reveal. http://www.independent.ie/irish-news/politics/former-fg-candidate-lands-260000-job-at-eu-court-35332995.html http://www.independent.ie/incoming/article35333117.ece/86fba/AUTOCROP/h342/SN%20COLM%20MAC%20EO%20Read-Only.jpg Lucrative job: High Court judge Colm Mac Eochaidh who has been nominated to represent Ireland on the EU General Court Picture: Steve Humphreys Taoiseach Enda Kenny has nominated a former Fine Gael general election candidate for a €260,000-a-year taxpayer funded job in the European Union justice system, the Sunday Independent can reveal.
